snippet: When Miami fell to the Dallas Mavericks in last year’s N.B.A. finals, it seemed as if the public was gleeful. So much has changed in a year.
abstract: Miami Heat and its Big Three--LeBron James, Chris Bosh, Dwayne Wade--assume the unusual role as underdogs entering the NBA finals against the Oklahoma City Thunder.
lead_paragraph: When Miami fell to the Dallas Mavericks in last year’s N.B.A. finals, it seemed as if the public was gleeful. So much has changed in a year.

headline.seo: N.B.A. Finals — LeBron James and Heat Assume Underdog Role
